util_add_functions

void util_add_functions ( &$this, &$handlers )

Add handler functions to an application.
Function Parameters:
- object $this: application
- array $handlers: List of handler names.
Function Info:
Access - public

util_add_raw_functions

void util_add_raw_functions ( &$this, &$handlers )

Add 'raw' handler functions to an application. 
No HTML header is generated for 'raw' handlers.
Function Parameters:
- object $this: application
- array $handlers: List of handler names.
Function Info:
Access - public

util_init_modules

void util_init_modules ( &$this, &$modules )

Initialise modules. 
The init function for each module must start with the module name
 and end with '_init' (e.g. 'mymodule_init' for module 'mymodule').
 Each init function takes a reference to the application object.
Function Parameters:
- object $this: application
- array $modules: List of module names.
Function Info:
Access - public
